senses.definition: 將某件物品訂好底價，畀人喺底價之上競逐，價高者得 (to sell something at the highest bid; to auction)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: paak3 maai6 gung1 si1
examples.translation: auction company

senses.definition: 排走#污水 (to drain away sewage)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: paai4 wu1
examples.translation: sewerage charge

senses.definition: 一種生喺#水 面嘅#草，被視為飄浮嘅象徵 (duckweed (used as a symbol of floating or wandering existence))
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: fau4 ping4
examples.translation: drifting duckweed

senses.definition: 人名用字，多數係女性所用 (used in names (often of females))
好有信心咁作保證 (to guarantee confidently)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢嗰陣拍晒心口咁話會還錢，而家連影都冇隻。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 go2 zan2 paak3 saai3 sam1 hau2 gam2 waa6 wui5 waan4 cin2, ji4 gaa1 lin4 jing2 dou1 mou5 zek3.
examples.translation: She promised to pay back but now can't been found anywhere.

senses.definition: 喺同一個地方行嚟行去，來回走動 (to linger; to walk back and forth, to and fro)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 有個可疑人物喺銀行前面徘徊。
examples.jyutping: jau5 go3 ho2 ji4 jan4 mat2 hai2 ngan4 hong4 cin4 min6 pui4 wui4.
examples.translation: A suspicious person lingered in front of the bank.

senses.definition: 喺數值之間浮動 (to osciliate; to fluctuate; to vary (between values))

examples.text: 恆指有機會喺萬五點徘徊。
examples.jyutping: hang4 zi2 jau5 gei1 wui6 hai2 maan6 ng5 dim2 pui4 wui4.
examples.translation: The HSI is likely to seesaw at around 15000 points.

senses.definition: 水面冇乜浪，冇乜波動 ((of waters) calm; tranquil)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: hoi2 min6 soeng1 dong1 ping4 zing6.
examples.translation: The surface of the sea is fairly calm.

senses.definition: 情緒冇起伏，冇乜刺激，亦冇偏側喺某一面 ((of mood or emotions) calm)

examples.text: 等佢心情平靜返落嚟，你先再同佢解釋清楚啦。
examples.jyutping: dang2 keoi5 sam1 cing4 ping4 zing6 faan1 lok6 lai4, nei5 sin1 zoi3 tung4 keoi5 gaai2 sik1 cing1 co2 laa1.
examples.translation: You'd better explain clearly again to him after he gets calm.

senses.definition: 同另一個人喺共同嘅空間，等佢冇咁寂寞 (to be someone's company; to accompany)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我聽日冇嘢做，你可唔可以過嚟陪我呀？
examples.jyutping: ngo5 ting1 jat6 mou5 je5 zou6, nei5 ho2 m4 ho2 ji5 gwo3 lai4 pui4 ngo5 aa3?
examples.translation: I'm free tomorrow. Can you come over and be my company?

senses.definition: 同另一個人一齊去一個地方，或者共同做一啲事，通常以嗰個人為主 (to go along with somebody)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 pui4 nei5 zou6 gung1 fo3 aa1!
examples.translation: Let me accompany you to do your homework.

senses.definition: 平時都有、都會發生，冇咩特別 (ordinary; usual; common)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢啲事好平常啫，唔使大驚小怪。
examples.jyutping: ni1 di1 si6 hou2 ping4 soeng4 ze1, m4 sai2 daai6 geng1 siu2 gwaai3.
examples.translation: These things are very commonplace, so you don't need to make such a big fuss about it.

senses.definition: 由若干長短不一嘅竹管或者木管連接起嚟嘅管樂器，每條管發嘅音都唔同；有好多種 (pan flute; panpipe)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #雲南 出產嘅一種#黑茶；通常喺市面上見到嘅都經過渥堆（後發酵），茶色褐紅；喺香港係一種好常見嘅茶（量詞：壺／甖／盅） (Pu'erh tea, a kind of Chinese dark tea produced in Yunnan)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: aa3 baa4 zeoi3 zung1 ji3 jam2 pou2 lei2.
examples.translation: Pu'erh tea is my father's favorite tea.

senses.definition: 植物名；葡萄科葡萄屬，落葉大藤本；葉掌狀分裂，具長柄，互生，心狀圓形；花色黃綠，呈圓錐形。果實亦叫作為「葡萄」，球形或橢圓形，呈紫或淡綠色，酸甜多汁，係常見水果，可以用嚟釀酒。（量詞：粒） (grape)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: pou4 tai4 zi2 gon1
examples.translation: dried grapes

senses.definition: 高而密，排到好似#屏風 噉嘅樓宇，產生#屏風效應（量詞：棟／排） (high and dense buildings aligned in such way as to form a kind of screen, impeding airflow)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 即係#蟹 (crab; see #蟹 haai5)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 形容波浪起得又急又猛 ((of waves) surging)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 強烈；猛烈 (fierce; strong; violent)

examples.jyutping: paang4 baai3 ge3 dung6 lik6
examples.translation: powerful motion

senses.definition: #論點（量詞：個） (point; concrete idea; viewpoint)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: mou5 pon1
examples.translation: non sequitur; not to make concrete ideas

senses.definition: #薪級點 (pay scale point)

examples.jyutping: tiu3 poin1
examples.translation: X

senses.definition: 澳門嘅#法定貨幣「#澳門幣」嘅通稱，單位係圓或者元 (Macau Pataca(MOP), i.e. currency of Macau (unit: pataca (official), dollar); literally: Portuguese currency(#葡#幣))
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #澳門 嘅#法定貨幣「#澳門幣」嘅通稱，單位係圓或者元 (Macau Pataca (MOP), the currency of Macau (unit: pataca (official), dollar); literally: Portuguese paper)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
成世都感到後悔，無法釋懷 (to feel regret for the rest of one's life)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢因為當年嘅決定而抱憾終生。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jan1 wai6 dong1 nin4 ge3 kyut3 ding6 ji4 pou5 ham6 zung1 sang1.
examples.translation: He felt regret of his decision for the rest of his life.

senses.definition: 同一物質喺同一時間發生唔同事情嘅現象，通常喺科幻故事出現；現實中有類似嘅物理研究 (parallel universe)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 形容直線或者平面嘅垂直距離一貫，就算無限伸展都唔會相交 (parallel)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 花園街同通菜街方向平行。
examples.jyutping: faa1 jyun4 gaai1 tung4 tung1 coi3 gaai1 fong1 hoeng3 ping4 hang4.
examples.translation: Fa Yuen Street is parallel to Tung Choi Street.

senses.definition: 同一物質喺同一時間發生唔同嘅事，有唔同嘅變化 ((of dimensions, timelines, realities, etc.) parallel; coexisting)

examples.jyutping: ping4 hang4 si4 hung1
examples.translation: parallel universe

senses.definition: 大廈單位（量詞：間） (transliteration from the English word "apartment", commonly used in Canadian Cantonese)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hoi2 ging2 paat1 man2
examples.translation: apartment with seaview

senses.definition: 公開露面，為咗利益而輕易露面，通常含有貶義 (to make a living in the public eye, to court publicity to make a living)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我可以幫手做啲文書工作，但係如果要我喺出面拋頭露面咁樣揾sponsor，我就勝任唔到啦。
examples.translation: I could help with some paperwork, but if I have to beg and ask for sponsorship outside, I'm afraid I could not help with it.

senses.definition: 冇乜錢，生活#拮据、艱苦 (poor; poverty-stricken; impecunious)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: pan4 fu2 hok6 saang1
examples.translation: impecunious student

senses.definition: 形容人賤格、冇品 ((of personality) being a jerk; despicable)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢明知人哋驚曱甴，仲呃人哋睇圖，真係好仆街。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ming4 zi1 jan4 dei6 geng1 gaat6 zaat2, zung6 ngaak1 jan4 dei6 tai2 tou4, zan1 hai6 hou2 puk1 gaai1.
examples.translation: He tricked her into opening that page with pictures of cockroaches, knowing that she's scared of them. He's such a jerk.

senses.definition: 睇得出已經用咗好耐，唔再新淨，有好多爛咗嘅地方 (old and shabby; worn-out)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 嗰個老人家著住件破舊嘅大褸。
examples.jyutping: go2 go3 lou5 jan4 gaa1 zoek3 zyu6 gin6 po3 gau6 ge3 daai6 lau1.
examples.translation: That old man is wearing a shabby old coat.

senses.definition: 一種源自#英國 嘅建築物，每一間排屋黐住隔籬嗰間噉起，兩間屋之間嘅牆係共用（量詞：間） (terraced houses)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 傳説中嘅瑞獸，龍頭獅身（量詞：隻） (legendary animal with a head of a Chinese dragon and a body of a lion)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種天文現象，指太陽光又或者月球受太陽光照射範圍，有部份被遮擋（前者係日偏食，後者係月偏食） (partial solar or lunar eclipse)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一個整數同另一個整數相乘嘅結果；嗰兩個整數都係個倍數嘅#因數 (multiple (mathematics))

examples.jyutping: sei3 hai6 ji6 ge3 pui5 sou3.
examples.translation: 4 is a multiple of 2.

senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我想將新棚仔呢度而家嘅情況，就話畀大家聽。

senses.definition: 整理收集返嚟嘅資料、編輯做書、報告等等 (to compile information into a book, report, etc.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我會將你哋嘅經歷編寫成一本書。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 wui5 zoeng1 nei5 dei6 ge3 ging1 lik6 pin1 se2 sing4 jat1 bun2 syu1.

senses.definition: 出街玩嘅地方；夜店 (a place where people go to have fun, a hangout spot; where people club)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 城內開咗間新嘅夜店，啲人又有新蒲點。
examples.translation: There's a new club in town, people now have a new hangout spot.

senses.definition: 因為誤解或者唔了解而形成嘅#偏頗#見解 (bias; prejudice)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: sing3 bit6 pin1 gin3
examples.translation: gender bias

senses.definition: 係空中圍繞著一樣嘢或者一個地方#飛 (to spiral; to circle; to spin)

examples.text: 有架直昇機喺空中盤旋。
examples.jyutping: jau5 gaa3 zik6 sing1 gei1 hai2 hung1 zung1 pun4 syun4.
examples.translation: There is a helicopter circling overhead.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
一個可以充氣嘅魚內臟，用嚟調節浮沉；可以做食材，曬乾咗嗰啲就係#魚肚 (swim bladder, fish maw; literally: fish bubble)

senses.definition: #昆蟲 嘅一種；特徵係個#背脊 色水鮮豔兼有斑點，佢哋通常會食一啲食草嘅細隻昆蟲－包括好多會破壞#農作物 嘅細蟲－所以一般瓢蟲都畀人覺得係一種益蟲。（量詞：群） (ladybird; ladybug)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 好多人都覺得瓢蟲好得意。
examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 jan4 dou1 gok3 dak1 piu1 cung4 hou2 dak1 ji3
examples.translation: Many people think ladybirds are cute.

急促而響亮嘅雷聲 (thunderclap)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: cing4 tin1 pik1 lik1
examples.translation: a bolt from the blue

senses.definition: 誇張咁表達輪候人數眾多 (innumerable; countless)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 想溝佢嘅人真係排隊排到尖沙咀！
examples.jyutping: soeng2 kau1 keoi5 ge3 jan4 zan1 hai6 paai4 deoi2 paai4 dou3 zim1 saa1 zeoi2!
examples.translation: She has legions of suitors.

senses.definition: 同其他人一齊參與、競爭一件事，而完全冇贏、得到回報嘅機會 (to participate in a competition, with no chance to win or have rewards)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 其實今次試鏡早就已經有內定嘅人選，你再努力都只不過係陪跑。
examples.jyutping: kei4 sat6 gam1 ci3 si3 geng3 zou2 zau6 ji5 ging1 jau5 noi6 ding6 ge3 jan4 syun2, nei5 zoi3 nou5 lik6 dou1 zi2 bat1 gwo3 hai6 pui4 paau2.
examples.translation: The audition is rigged. No matter how hard you try, you won't get a single chance to beat him.

senses.definition: 跌親，出現麻煩嘅情況 (to fall down,to get into difficulties)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢俾蕉皮跣親，一嘢仆到。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 bei2 ziu1 pei4 sin3 can1, jat1 je5 puk1 dou2.
examples.translation: He slipped on a banana peel and fell down.

senses.definition: 覺得某個人好勁，或者好值得人尊重 (to admire somebody)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我好佩服佢肯冒生命危險救人。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 hou2 pui3 fuk6 keoi5 hang2 mou6 sang1 ming6 ngai4 him2 gau3 jan4.
examples.translation: I really admire how he risked his own life to save others from danger.

senses.definition: 喺一塊表面上拱起咗而入面裝住空氣或水嘅嗰嚿嘢 (bubble)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 faai3 mon1 tip3 ci1 dou3 hei2 saai3 pok1.
examples.translation: Your screen protector has so many bubbles in it.

senses.definition: 因為皮膚受傷而喺皮膚表面起嘅嘢 (blister)

examples.jyutping: seoi2 pok1
examples.translation: blister

senses.definition: #膽量 (courage; guts)

examples.jyutping: gau6 pok1
examples.translation: to have enough guts

senses.definition: 擔任臨時演員，做#茄哩啡、#臨記 (to be an "extra" in a film, to be hired as a very minor role, e.g. in crowd scenes)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢初時諗住一入行就可以做主角，點知跑龍套跑咗十年。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 co1 si4 nam2 zyu6 jat1 jap6 hong4 zau6 ho2 ji5 zou6 zyu2 gok3, dim2 zi1 paau2 lung4 tou3 paau2 zo2 sap6 nin4.
examples.translation: He thought he could be a main character when first entering his career. However, no one expected that he would have been taking minor roles only for 10 years.

senses.definition: #甘蔗 汁曬乾而成嘅固體片，未經提煉，多啲雜質 (slab sugar)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: bou1 tong4 seoi2 jiu3 lok6 pin3 tong4.
examples.translation: Add slab sugar into it when you are cooking sweet soup.

senses.definition: 速度快過前面目標，從後追過；#超前 (to overtake; to move faster so as to pass)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: hai2 waan1 wai2 paa4 tau4 hou2 ngai4 him2!
examples.translation: It's dangerous to overtake on a bend (when driving).

senses.definition: #打尖；#插隊；排喺#隊 嘅中間，唔跟先後排 (to surpass; to jump the queue; to cut in line)

examples.jyutping: m4 goi1 m4 hou2 paa4 tau4.
examples.translation: Please don't jump the queue.

senses.definition: #搶先 (to try to be the first to do something)

examples.jyutping: paa4 aa3 go1 tau4 git3 fan1
examples.translation: get married before one's older brother

senses.definition: 中年至老年嘅女人，而神態比較壯健、潑辣，有貶意 (mid-aged or old women with a stronger figure and in fierce manner , a derogatory term; literally: granny female)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 街口嗰幾個婆乸一日到黑講人是非，真係好討厭。
examples.jyutping: gaai1 hau2 go2 gei2 go3 po4 naa2 jat1 jat6 dou3 hak1 gong2 jan4 si6 fei1, zan1 hai6 hou2 tou2 jim3.
examples.translation: Those shrews on the street corner keep gossiping for the whole day, really annoying.

senses.definition: 比喻斤斤計較、唔得大體、保守拘緊、過時老土嘅人或事 (figuratively small-minded, petty, conservative, out-dated persons or things)

examples.translation: sundry expenses

senses.definition: 形容某物件被水流帶走，隨水流動嘅狀態。喺文學上，引申無力對抗歷史時勢而有意識或無意識咁跟隨潮流。 (to be carried along on the water; to be driven by the current; in literature, it imply following a fashion or trend mindlessly or consciousness but helplessly)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: lok6 jip6 ceoi4 seoi2 piu1 lau4.
examples.translation: Fallen leaves float along the river.

senses.definition: 短時間內睇熟一本或多本書；為應試而短時間內深入咁温書。 (to delve into books in a relatively short time; to swot up, i.e. Study assiduously; literally, to peel books.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 下星期考試，佢晚晚都刨書刨到十二點。
examples.jyutping: haa6 sing1 kei4 haau2 si5, keoi5 maan5 maan5 dou1 paau4 syu1 paau4 dou3 sap6 ji6 dim2.
examples.translation: The exam is going to take place next week, and he has been swotting up all the syllabus every day until midnight.

senses.definition: 用嚟 #儲存 處理過嘅 #自來水 嘅 #水庫（量詞：個／座） (service reservoir)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 有啲配水庫嘅上蓋用嚟做遊樂場，有啲就閒置咗。
examples.jyutping: jau5 di1 pui3 seoi2 fu3 ge3 soeng6 goi3 jung6 lei4 zou6 jau4 lok6 coeng4, jau5 di1 zau6 haan4 zi3 zo2.
examples.translation: Some rooftops of service reservoir are allocated as playgrounds; some remain idle.

senses.definition: 釋放；排出；放出 (to discharge; to emit; to release)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: paai4 fong3 wu1 seoi2
examples.translation: to discharge sewage

senses.definition: 一段文字嘅長度 (length of a piece of writing)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢篇文章嘅篇幅都唔算長。
examples.jyutping: ni1 pin1 man4 zoeng1 ge3 pin1 fuk1 dou1 m4 syun3 coeng4.
examples.translation: This article is not too long.

senses.definition: 印刷品上面嘅空位 (printed space)

examples.jyutping: pin1 fuk1 jau5 haan6
examples.translation: have limited space to print

senses.definition: 平正和諧、調和 (calm; gentle; level-headed)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢份人性情平和，係個好爸爸。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 fan6 jan4 sing3 cing4 ping4 wo4, hai6 go3 hou2 baa4 baa1.
examples.translation: He is a gentle person and a good father.

senses.definition: （常指喺水面上）浮動 ((usu. of things on a water surface) to float)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 有個玻璃樽喺海面漂浮喎！
examples.jyutping: jau5 go3 bo1 lei1 zeon1 hai2 hoi2 min6 piu1 fau4 wo3!
examples.translation: There is a glass bottle floating on the surface of the sea.

senses.definition: #菲律賓、#墨西哥 等國使用嘅貨幣 (peso, the currency of Philippines, Mexico etc)

senses.definition: 比喻固守舊有事物或思想，唔識變通 (to stickler for tradition; to be conservative)

examples.translation: A conservative attitude is often an obstacle to promoting reform.

examples.translation: In the Olympics in 2012, Hong Kong  gymnast Angel Wong Hiu-ying got onto the balance beam with a movement she designed herself. The movement was thus named after her name.

senses.definition: 意式薄餅；由麪粉製成嘅圓形底餅上加上各式食材，常見嘅有芝士、蕃茄醬、煙肉、辣肉腸等等（量詞：塊） (pizza)

senses.definition: 一種疾病；由梭狀芽胞桿菌感染引起，病徵包括全身肌肉痙攣、發燒、頭痛等。喺以前，破傷風通常係由於剪#臍帶 用嘅#鉸剪 唔乾淨而導致感染嘅，而家通常係因為畀啲污糟嘅金屬鎅傷導致。破傷風#疫苗 同#抗體 可以預防破傷風。 (tetanus; lockjaw)

examples.text: 你喺地盤畀啲鋅鐵鎅傷都唔睇醫生呀？小心破傷風喎。

senses.definition: #大耳窿 同#債仔 之間嘅中間人 (a intermediary between a loanshark and a debtor)

駕駛術語；係一種華麗轉彎嘅技巧，司機會利用煞車同畀大油造成一種可以控制嘅跣呔，喺咁嘅情況轉彎，架車就唔會完全依照前輪嘅角度嚟行；飄移喺公路賽車唔多見，因為咁樣轉彎其實係會慢咗，反而喺啲越野賽車成日可以見到 (to drift; to slide)

examples.jyutping: jat1 pin1 siu2 syut3

senses.definition: 用#被 摺實成睡袋形，底下形成温暖舒適嘅空間 (quilt folded to form a sleeping bag; warm and comfortable space under a quilt)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 做咩匿埋喺被竇入面喊啊？
examples.jyutping: zou6 me1 nei1 maai4 hai2 pei5 dau3 jap6 min6 haam3 aa3?

examples.jyutping: pei4 fu1 ngaam4

senses.definition: 同你有交情，通常志趣相投，會互相幫助，但係未必有任何血緣關係嘅人（量詞：個） (friend)

examples.text: 你犯咗法就要接受刑罰，法官係唔會因為你年紀輕而破例唔罰你嘅。
examples.translation: You broke the law, then you had to accept the punishment, the judge would not make any exception because of your young age and not to punish you.

senses.definition: 申領政府嘅牌照或者證明嘅費用；有時會特指一架車嘅車輛牌照費，特別嘅地方係車嘅牌費係有得註銷嚟退錢嘅 (license fee)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: teoi3 paai4 fai3
examples.translation: to apply for refund of vehicle license fee

senses.definition: 一種冰品。將#冰 塊#刨 碎，再淋上果汁或各種物料（通常係甜嘅），以供食用 (shaved ice)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 好無禮咁叫人走開 (used to tell someone to leave in a hostile way, "fuck off!")
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 偷偷#扒 走受害者身上財物嘅人（量詞：個） (pickpocket; literally: claw hand)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: siu2 sam1 paa4 sau2!
examples.translation: Beware of pickpocket!

senses.definition: 編製、編輯；通常指涉及大量資料嘅書籍 (to compile a book that usually involves a large amount of data)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 交保護費畀警察 (to pay the police for protection)
派卡片畀人 (give out your name card)
分配額度；數量、人數嘅上限（量詞：個） (quota; quota of)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 香港每日有150個單程證配額。
examples.translation: Hong Kong has a quota of 150 for the single-entry permit per day.
